-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Bertram Pincus is a man whose people skills leave much to be desired. When Pincus 
dies unexpectedly, but is miraculously revived after seven minutes, he wakes up 
to discover that he now has the annoying ability to see ghosts. Even worse, they 
all want something from him, particularly Frank Herlihy who pesters him into 
breaking up the impending marriage of his widow Gwen. That puts Pincus squarely 
in the middle of a triangle with spirited result.

Director: David Koepp

Writers : David Koepp
          John Kamps
   
Cast    :

Greg Kinnear     ...     Frank Herlihy
Jordan Carlos    ...     Young Husband
Dequina Moore    ...     Young Wife
